sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects the creation of potentially malicious script and executable files in Windows startup folders, which is a common persistence technique used by threat actors.
These files (.ps1, .vbs, .js, .bat, etc.) are automatically executed when a user logs in, making the Startup folder an attractive target for attackers.
This technique is frequently observed in malvertising campaigns and malware distribution where attackers attempt to maintain long-term access to compromised systems.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup\download.js; EventID=11}
@{RuleName=T1023; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wscript.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup\download.js; EventID=11}
@{TargetFilename=%APPDATA%\microsoft\windows\start menu\programs\startup\aycnf.js}
@{TargetFilename=%APPDATA%\microsoft\windows\start menu\programs\startup\gmhvt.js}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects instances of svchost.exe running with an unusual or uncommon command line parameter by excluding known legitimate or common patterns.
This could point at a file masquerading as svchost, a process injection, or hollowing of a legitimate svchost instance.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=%WINDIR%\system32\svchost.exe; Image=C:\Windows\system32\svchost.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Non-Browser Network Communication With Telegram API
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects an a non-browser process interacting with the Telegram API which could indicate use of a covert C2

match_context.values: @{DestinationIp=149.154.166.110; DestinationPort=443; DestinationHostname=api.telegram.org; Initiated=true}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious DNS queries to api.telegram.org used by Telegram Bots of any kind

match_context.values: @{query=api.telegram.org}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Registry Tampering by Potentially Suspicious Processes
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects suspicious registry modifications made by suspicious processes such as script engine processes such as WScript, or CScript etc.
These processes are rarely used for legitimate registry modifications, and their activity may indicate an attempt to modify the registry
without using standard tools like regedit.exe or reg.exe, potentially for evasion and persistence.

match_context.values: @{EventType=SetValue; EventID=13; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; Details=QWORD (0x00000000-0x004a0017); TargetObject=HKU\S-1-5-21-1070296143-2877979003-364783958-1001\Software\Microsoft\Windows Script\Settings\Telemetry\wscript.exe\JScriptSetScriptStateStarted}
@{EventID=13; Details=Binary Data; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; EventType=SetValue; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Notifications\Data\418A073AA3BC1C75}

@{EventID=13; EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; Details=QWORD (0x00000000-0x004aadcc); TargetObject=HKU\S-1-5-21-1070296143-2877979003-364783958-1001\Software\Microsoft\Windows Script\Settings\Telemetry\wscript.exe\JScriptSetScriptStateStarted}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Msbuild Execution By Uncommon Parent Process
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious execution of 'Msbuild.exe' by a uncommon parent process

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=77360AA532C299F636F424A2866016EE6BD5C09B,MD5=F8E68D6ABE411CE0C71D6B8C1C1B9048,SHA256=151D0125C20CDDE578D02DE3F2A56EB904870A887BB7F1C59BF61471DA231916,IMPHASH=F34D5F2D4577ED6D9CEEC516C1F5A744; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=MSBuild.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae .NET Framework; Description=MSBuild.exe; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=powershell -NoProfile -WindowStyle Hidden -Command "[System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetString([System.Convert]::FromBase64String(' [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine="C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Msbuild.exe"; FileVersion=4.8.9032.0 built by: NET481REL1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=Medium; Image=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\MSBuild.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects execution of "csc.exe" to compile .NET code. Attackers often leverage this to compile code on the fly and use it in other stages.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=F65B029562077B648A6A5F6A1AA76A66,SHA256=4A6D0864E19C0368A47217C129B075DDDF61A6A262388F9D21045D82F3423ED7,IMPHASH=EE1E569AD02AA1F7AECA80AC0601D80D; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=csc.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae .NET Framework; Description=Visual C# Command Line Compiler; FileVersion=4.8.4084.0 built by: NET48REL1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Msbuild.exe"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v4.0.30319\csc.exe" /target:exe /out:"C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\MSBuild.exe" "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\guardian_src_4f8dfc5004084631846e6a3baad8075a.cs"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\MSBuild.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v4.0.30319\csc.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious File Access to Browser Credential Storage
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects file access to browser credential storage paths by non-browser processes, which may indicate credential access attempts.
Adversaries may attempt to access browser credential storage to extract sensitive information such as usernames and passwords or cookies.
This behavior is often commonly observed in credential stealing malware.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: frack113, X__Junior (Nextron Systems), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems), Parth-FourCore

match_context.values: @{FileName=%LOCALAPPDATA%\microsoft\edge\user data\default\login data}
@{FileName=%LOCALAPPDATA%\google\chrome\user data\default\login data}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET EXPLOIT_KIT ReverseLoader Base64 Payload Inbound
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET EXPLOIT_KIT ReverseLoader Base64 Payload Inbound"; flow:established,to_client; file.data; content:"lRXdjVGeFxGblh2U"; classtype:exploit-kit; sid:2020423; rev:3; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state plaintext, created_at 2015_02_16, deployment Perimeter, malware_family ReverseLoader, confidence Medium, signature_severity Major, updated_at 2024_10_23;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Reverse Base64 Encoded MZ Header Payload Inbound
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Reverse Base64 Encoded MZ Header Payload Inbound"; flow:established,to_client; content:"AAAAEAAAAMAAQqVT"; endswith; reference:md5,ed54f068782aaff84dce2776a3ffbd73; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2057635; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, affected_product Windows_11, attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state TLSDecrypt, created_at 2024_11_15, deployment Perimeter, deployment SSLDecrypt, malware_family ReverseLoader, confidence High, signature_severity Major, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2024_11_18;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any $HTTP_PORTS ( msg:"POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt"; flow:to_server,established; http_header; content:"Host:",fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/^Host\x3a\s*(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\s*:?\s*\d*\s*$/ims"; service:http; reference:url,www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec15.html; classtype:policy-violation; sid:50447; rev:1; )
alert ( gid:129; sid:1; rev:2; msg:"(stream_tcp) SYN on established session"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type preproc; classtype:bad-unknown;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip [103.36.64.0/22,103.37.118.0/24,103.43.140.0/22,103.44.208.0/22,103.48.36.0/22,103.52.48.0/22,103.54.164.0/22,103.55.84.0/22,103.56.144.0/22,103.58.68.0/22,103.70.114.0/23,103.72.200.0/24,103.80.132.0/22,103.81.44.0/22,103.83.86.0/23,103.84.170.0/23,103.84.196.0/23,103.93.76.0/24,103.93.77.0/24,103.93.78.0/24] any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET DROP Spamhaus DROP Listed Traffic Inbound group 17"; reference:url,www.spamhaus.org/drop/drop.txt; threshold: type limit, track by_src, seconds 3600, count 1; classtype:misc-attack; flowbits:set,ET.Evil; flowbits:set,ET.DROPIP; sid:2400016; rev:4587; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Any, deployment Perimeter, tag Dshield, signature_severity Minor, created_at 2010_12_30, updated_at 2026_01_14;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Telegram API Certificate Observed
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING Telegram API Certificate Observed"; flow:established,to_client; tls.cert_subject; content:"CN=api.telegram.org"; fast_pattern; nocase; endswith; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2029322; rev:2; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2020_01_27, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Minor, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2020_10_27;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Telegram API Domain in DNS Lookup
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET HUNTING Telegram API Domain in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; content:"api.telegram.org"; nocase; bsize:16; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2033966; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_09_16, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Minor, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2021_09_16;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Observed Telegram API Domain (api .telegram .org in TLS SNI)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING Observed Telegram API Domain (api .telegram .org in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"api.telegram.org"; bsize:16; fast_pattern; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2033967; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_09_16, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2021_09_16;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Observed Google DNS over HTTPS Domain (dns .google in TLS SNI)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Observed Google DNS over HTTPS Domain (dns .google in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; threshold: type both, track by_src, count 1, seconds 600; tls.sni; dotprefix; content:".dns.google"; endswith; reference:url,developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/doh/; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047866; rev:4; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_02_07, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag DoH, updated_at 2023_10_05, reviewed_at 2023_10_05, former_sid 2851058; target:src_ip;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO KeyAuth Open-source Authentication System Domain in DNS Lookup (keyauth .win)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO KeyAuth Open-source Authentication System Domain in DNS Lookup (keyauth .win)"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".keyauth.win"; nocase; endswith; reference:url,community.emergingthreats.net/t/false-positive-et-info-domain-virustotal/2049; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2050231; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_01_19, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_10_14, reviewed_at 2025_07_14;)

alert udp $HOME_NET any -> any 53 ( msg:"INDICATOR-COMPROMISE Suspicious .win dns query"; flow:to_server; byte_test:1,!&,0xF8,2; content:"|03|win|00|",fast_pattern,nocase; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,policy security-ips drop; service:dns; classtype:misc-activity; sid:44077; rev:2; )

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered unknown. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

attributes.magic: Unicode text, UTF-8 text, with CRLF line terminators
